title: Mushishi Zoku Shou Special
alternative_title: Mushishi Zoku Shou: Odoro no Michi, 蟲師 続章
description: Previously unaired episodes 11 and 12 of Mushishi Zoku Shou will be broadcasted as an one hour special on August 20, 2014 and bundled with anime's third Blu-ray/DVD volume on November 26, 2014. Adapts "Odoro no Michi" (Path of Thorns) manga chapters.
genre: [<Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> Mystery>, <Genre -> Seinen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
